metrics.name: Total paid late amount
metrics.description: Total of all amounts in accounts receivable documents that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: Invoiced Amount
metrics.description: Global Currency

metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are overdue (converted in USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${i2c_s4hc_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		 AND ${i2c_s4hc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
	)

metrics.name: Total overdue amount (with timeframe)
metrics.description: Total of all amounts in Accounts Receivables that are overdue for longer than a certain timeframe

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared less than one day or more before and no later than one day or more after their due dates

metrics.name: Total paid late amount
metrics.description: Total of all amounts in Accounts Receivables that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: Total invoiced amount
metrics.description: Total of all invoiced amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: Percentage of reversed invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were reversed

metrics.name: Total open amount
metrics.description: Total of all open amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: Number of rejected billing requests (DMR)
metrics.description: Number of rejected Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests)

metrics.name: Early payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before their due dates

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: Invoice cancellation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices (Billing Documents) that were cancelled

metrics.name: Average payment delay
metrics.description: Average delay of payments in days

metrics.name: Billing request (DMR) rejection rate
metrics.description: Percentage of Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests) that were rejected

metrics.name: Days sales outstanding (DSO)
metrics.description: Average number of days to collect revenue, weighted by the invoice value

metrics.name: Total cleared amount
metrics.description: Total of all cleared amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: Average time invoice creation to invoice clearing within timeframe
metrics.description: Average time from invoice creation to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${i2c_s4hc_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${i2c_s4hc_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${i2c_s4hc_invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Average accounts receivables creation to clearing time
metrics.description: Average time from Accounts Receivable creation to clearing

metrics.name: Average net payment terms
metrics.description: Average of net payment terms in days

metrics.name: Number of overdue accounts receivable documents (with timeframe)
metrics.description: Number of all Accounts Receivable documents that are overdue for longer than a certain timeframe

metrics.name: Number of invoices cancelled
metrics.description: Number of invoices (Billing Documents) that were cancelled

metrics.name: Number of cleared accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivable documents that were fully cleared

metrics.name: Number of open accounts receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivable documents that are not yet cleared

metrics.name: Number of open accounts receivables documents (with timeframe)
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivables documents open for longer than a certain timeframe

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared one or more days after their due dates
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date} IS NULL AND ${i2c_s4hc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
	)
/ COUNT (case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date} IS NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		 AND ${i2c_s4hc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Number of accounts receivables documents paid late
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivables documents that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: Number of accounts receivables documents
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivables documents that were created

metrics.name: Number of invoices created
metrics.description: Number of invoices (Billing Documents) that were created

metrics.name: Number of billing requests (DMR)
metrics.description: Number of Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests)

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_clear_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Accounts Receivable'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_invoice_reversal_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the reversal of an invoice, for example 'Reverse Accounts Receivable'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "AR_LastClearingDate"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_early_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too early, for example '1day'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_cleared_sum_currency
metricVariables.description: Field defining in which currency the cleared amounts are to be calculated, for example "AR_ClearedAmountInGlobalCurrency"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "AR_LastNetDueDate"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_amount_currency
metricVariables.description: Field defining in which currency the amounts are to be calculated on event level, for example "AmountInGlobalCurrency"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_amount_conv
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_overdue_ar_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to consider for calculation of overdue Accounts Receivable documents, for example '30days' after net due date

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_posting_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "AR_LastCreationDateTime"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_invoiced_sum_currency
metricVariables.description: Field defining in which currency the invoiced amounts are to be calculated, for example "AR_InvoicedAmountInGlobalCurrency"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_open_ar_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to consider for calculation of open Accounts Receivable documents, for example '30days'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "AutomationFlag" = 'X'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_late_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too late, for example '1day'

metricVariables.name: automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'
